data.name: The greater number  since...
data.description:
Normally in the newspapers we can read news like "this has been the hottest month since...", but calculating this milestone is not easy if there is a lot of data.

For each id and number, the following must be returned:

* the previous id that had a strictly greater number than the one provided
* the id of the provided if there was no greater element (or it is the first)

There are solutions in O(n^2), but one with cost O(n) is required. The test space is over 10^6 elements. Optimization is mandatory. You donÂ´t need more than O(n) in space cost.

In the example provided, the id = "1/1999" is greater than all the others that are provided until the element "4/1999" is entered, which has "3/1999" as its maximum.
